name: E-Liminal-ators: The Pool
description:
Do you know the feeling of being in a place that you don't belong? When the walls hiss their hatred of your presence into your ears, and unshakable unease settles around your neck, there's nothing you can do to feel safe.

But there is something WE can!

Call the E-Liminal-ators today for all your unspookifying needs! We'll take your home, business, or social space from horrifying to homey OVERNIGHT!
